p: The glide tool of Maestro was used for the virtual screening purpose. A total of 56,079 compounds were screened through the three step VSW (virtual screen workflow) in a tandem HTVS, SP and XP progression. Enhanced sampling method and flexible docking were enabled in XP to screen hits for N protein NTD models (2OFZ and 1SSK) (Desmond, n.d.; Meng et al., 2011).
